title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of The Herd, Colin sees some issues emerging for the Dallas Mavericks after getting blasted in San Francisco by the Golden State Warriors in Game 1 of the Western Conference Finals.  Also, it's apparent to Colin that Alabama head football coach Nick Saban wants to have his recruiting cake and eat it, too.  Plus, FOX Sports college football analyst and writer Bruce Feldman joins Colin to reflect on the budding Nick Saban-Jimbo Fisher recruiting dispute, what Miami is building under new head coach Mario Cristobal, and what to expect from USC in 2022.  Finally, best-selling author Alan Shipnuck joins the show to discuss Tiger Woods' ongoing recovery from a car accident, Phil Mickelson's gambling habits, and Mickelson's golf league dealings with Saudi Arabia (as detailed in Shipnuck's new book).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
